title: 0.5mm GGS Electrostatic Technology Self-adhesive 0.5mm Optical Glass Reuse Camera LCD Screen Protector for Canon 6D DSLR - White
description: Description:The LCD screen protector is designed to protect screen from scratches or damage. With glass self-adhesive design, applied on the LCD screen with gapless technique without affecting the sensitivity of touch/swivel screen, protector is easy to install, leaves NO sticky residue when removed.Features: 1. Static electricity technology, with 130g/ cm2 adhesive force and non-separated while in usage. 2. 0.5mm Optical Glass made in Japan, transmittance over than 90%, suitable for protecting the touch-screen and swivel-screen, dust-roof,sweat-proof, and anti-aging. 3. Strengthen and Polishing process of the glass surface, hardness over than 8H,anti-friction and anti-scratches. 4. Built-in explosion-proof layer, elasticity pression up to 12kg/cm, explosion-proof and impact-proof. 5. Simple installation and disassembling, no sticky residue after removed.SpecificationMaterialResin, electrostatic silica gel .hickness0.5MM .Weight10g .Suitable for:Canon 6Dpackage includes: 1x LCD screen protector
